question: Who among the following authors wrote "Maduravijayam"?
explanation: The Telugu princess and poet of the Vijayanagar empire, Gangadevi wrote a Sanskrit epic poem, \"Madura Vijayam\" (the  Conquest of Madurai). The poem describes in detail, the victory of her husband, Kumara Kampana ( son of Bukka Raya I) over  the Madurai Sultanate.
